articles.title: Spokesman of Pomminryon North HQ Slams Lee Group's Renewed Hideous Provocation
articles.content:
Spokesman of Pomminryon North HQ Slams Lee Group's Renewed Hideous Provocation
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, (Pomminryon), in a statement Friday assailed the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea for committing such thrice-cursed crime as daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK again with the return to the south of Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon as a momentum. 
					This vicious confrontation racket and fascist crackdown by the group are another intolerable grave challenge to the DPRK and treacherous and anti-reunification act of disturbing national reconciliation and unity and inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					Ro's Pyongyang visit was a token of due courtesy prompted by the desire to share sorrow over the great loss to the nation and an entirely righteous action in view of the traditional beautiful manners and customs of the Korean nation and the spirit of national reconciliation and unity. This can never be a crime. 
					
					It is none other than the worst Lee Myung Bak group of traitors that deserves punishment because it leveled guns at the fellow countrymen mourning over the big loss to the nation and barred south Koreans of many political parties and organizations and individuals from visiting Pyongyang to express condolences. 
					
					The group was so disgusting as to ask the U.S. aggression forces in south Korea to let those concerned of the "UN Command" issue over a loudspeaker from the morning a warning to Ro Su Hui to go back from Panmunjom. 
					
					The group's brutal suppression of Ro admits of no excuse because it already knew that south Korean people of different circles including members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon were awaiting Ro to welcome his return through Panmunjom.
					
					The Lee group will never escape destruction for its thrice-cursed crimes committed against the nation.

articles.title: Pomminryon South Headquarters Denounces Legal Action against Ro
articles.content:
Pomminryon South Headquarters Denounces Legal Action against Ro
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) on Thursday held a meeting for welcoming Vice-Chairman Ro Su Hui's return before the Rimjin Pavilion, Phaju of Kyonggi Province. 
					The speakers warmly welcomed Ro Su Hui who paid a condolence visit, reflecting the will of the nation and the desire for the country's reunification, noting that he conducted various activities to promote the unity of the nation in the north and came back across the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					They said that his activities should be used as an occasion of developing the south-north relations.
					
					This being a hard fact, the "government" authorities are set to take a legal action against the pro-reunification figure on charge of the violation of the "Security Law" for the mere reason that he has ideology and political view different from them, they added. This is a brutal action.
					
					They urged the authorities to stop the unreasonable crackdown, declaring Ro's Pyongyang visit was just.
					
					The participants chanted slogan "We strongly oppose the legal action against Vice-Chairman Ro Su Hui", holding placards and posters reading "Implement the June 15 joint declaration agreed upon by the nation!", "By our nation itself" and "Abolish the Security Law!"

articles.title: Foreign Personages Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy in Pyongyang on Friday laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to commemorate the 18th anniversary of the demise of the President.
					After laying the basket in humble reverence for the peerlessly great men, they bowed to the statues. 
					
					Members of the UNDP, WFP, UNICEF and WHO here also visited the statues to lay floral baskets on the same day.

articles.title: Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit New Residents in Changjon Street
articles.content:
Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit New Residents in Changjon Street
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Senior party, state and army officials Thursday visited families that moved to new flats in Changjon Street. 
					Among them were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and Ri Yong Ho, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					Among those families were the family of Hong Sun Hui in Taedongmun-dong No. 6 visited by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the family of Kim Kwang Chol, worker of Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, in Jongro-dong No. 2, the family of Ri Jun Yong, teacher at Kim Il Sung University, in Jongro-dong No. 3, and the family of Ri Hak Chol, worker of the Horticultural Station of Central District, in Kyongsang-dong No. 9. 
					
					They cordially received the visitors.
					
					The senior officials congratulated the residents on their moving to new modern flats. 
					
					They learnt in detail about their families and their living conditions and heard about their feelings after moving to flats. They told the families about the warm loving care for the people of leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un who provided this happiness.
					
					The residents unanimously extended thanks to Kim Jong Un for bestowing upon them such honor to receive the deep loving care of Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to the people's happiness. 
					
					The officials expressed expectation that the residents would remember the loving care of the party forever, follow Kim Jong Un and devote their patriotic mind to the prosperity of the country. 
					
					The senior officials had taken photographs with the residents of the houses and handed household articles to the families as souvenirs.

articles.title: Remembrance Concert of Women's Union Members Held
articles.content:
Remembrance Concert of Women's Union Members Held
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Remembrance concert of women's union members "Women Sing the Song of the Eternal Sun" took place here on Friday, two days before the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.  
					Put on the stage were numbers of diverse genres such as narration and chorus "People Sing of the Leader", violin solo and chorus "Nostalgia" and piano solo and chorus "Where Are You, Dear General?" 
					
					The performers praised immortal feats of the President, who liberated Korea by waging hard-fought anti-Japanese struggle and built the socialist power centered on the popular masses on this land.
					
					Striking a chord in the hearts of the audience were numbers expressing ardent yearning for leader Kim Jong Il, who firmly defended socialism, the precious heritage left by the President, and provided the foundation for the prosperity of the nation. 
					
					Numbers including sextet "Song of Women" sang high praises of the pride and self-respect of the Korean women who are being brought up as revolutionaries and enjoy a worthwhile life under the loving care of the peerlessly great men.

articles.title: Online Koryo Medical Service System Established in DPRK
articles.content:
Online Koryo Medical Service System Established in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has made a radical progress in putting medical service on an IT basis.
					The Academy of Koryo Medicine established the online Koryo medical service system across the country.
					
					This system helps central hospitals share with local hospitals information on prevention and remedy of diseases by Koryo medicine through computer network. The system covers diagnosis, assistance to treatment, access to database and consultations.
					
					Local medical workers can easily get access to data on diagnosis and remedy by Koryo medicine. Ordinary people, too, can get such a kind of medical service through network.

articles.title: New Poster Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
New Poster Produced in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- New poster "Forward to final victory under the leadership of the great party!" was produced in the DPRK. 
					It vividly represents a serviceman, a worker, a farmer and an intellectual out in the drive to realize the noble intention of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, flying the flag of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					Seen on the poster are words "Single-minded unity," "Invincible military capability" and "Industrial revolution in the new century" which reflect a strategic line for building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					It calls upon all the service personnel and people to advance full of confidence towards the final victory in the cause of building a thriving nation, united close behind the great party.

articles.title: Training for Quick Reading Encouraged in DPRK Secondary Schools
articles.content:
Training for Quick Reading Encouraged in DPRK Secondary Schools
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A brisk campaign for quick reading is going on at secondary schools in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					The method of quick reading created by Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 is popular among secondary school students. The method has been systematized to help students get accustomed to it.
					
					According to educationists, the training for quick reading is conducive to improving their concentration, memory and judgment.
					
					The training makes it possible for students to learn by heart any text of foreign language books in three to five minutes, which would take 30 minutes in general.
					
					Jang Chong Song, a 16-year-old student of Pyongyang Jonsung Secondary School, told KCNA that his reading speed increased 5 to 10 times after taking a quick reading exercise for 60 hours.

articles.title: Sincere Option for Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations Urged
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. made public an article on July 4, the 40th anniversary of the July 4 joint statement.
					The article urged the south Korean "government" authorities to opt for sincerely implementing the north-south joint declarations.
					
					July 4, 1972 was the day when the three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- was proclaimed, the article said, recalling that the Koreans in the U.S. were overcome with joy and excitement four decades ago.
					
					The three principles serve as a great programme for independent reunification to be invariably held fast to by the Koreans, it said, and went on:
					
					The military dictatorial regime of south Korea dependent on outsiders, however, used this precious agreement of the nation as a lever for temporarily calming down the people's resistance against the "yusin system" and threw it away like a pair of old shoes in the end.
					
					The publication of the June 15 joint declaration, an embodiment of the spirit of the July 4 joint statement, served as a historic watershed for ending the history of national division and marking a beginning of the era of national reconciliation and cooperation for reunification.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime escalated moves for confrontation and war instead of pursuing reconciliation and cooperation in denial of the declarations.

articles.title: Three Principles of Korea's Reunification Provided by Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Three Principles of Korea's Reunification Provided by Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- In his lifetime President Kim Il Sung provided the three principles for Korea's reunification as the first reunification program common to the nation.
					Worrying himself about the tragic national division, the President suggested having dialogue between the north and the south of Korea in his speech on August 6, Juche 60 (1971).
					
					He advanced an epoch-making policy on having north-south wide-ranging talks, stating that the DPRK was ready to meet at any time with all political parties and social organizations, including the ruling Democratic Republican Party, and individuals in south Korea.
					
					On May 3, 1972, he met a south Korean delegate in Pyongyang and mentioned the need to establish the principle of national reunification.
					
					He stressed that Korea's reunification should be realized independently without outsiders' interference and by peaceful means on the principle of promoting great national unity.
					
					At that time, the delegate made a promise to keep these three principles as the mainstay for national reunification.
					
					The three principles of national reunification were announced through the north-south joint statement on July 4 that year to enjoy full support from people at home and abroad.
					
					Political parties and organizations in south Korea made public statements in support of the principles.
					
					South Korean media, too, vied with each other in introducing the three principles, describing them as "the supreme idea above all isms and doctrines" and "the best and shortest way to reunification.
					
					Resolutions and documents supporting the principles were also adopted at the 28th and 30th UN General Assembly sessions and the non-aligned summit and FM conferences.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Dismisses Japanese Newspapers' Story about DPRK's Uranium Enrichment
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Dismisses Japanese Newspapers' Story about DPRK's Uranium Enrichment
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Japanese papers Tokyo Shimbun and Mainichi Shimbun on July 2 released misinformation that they got what they called a "document" on the DPRK's program for developing nuclear weapons, "there was an instruction to make nuclear bombs by use of highly-enriched uranium" and "it was a political behest".
					It is a politically-motivated plot to create a fresh atmosphere for ratcheting up international pressure on the DPRK as the story is a totally groundless and sheer fabrication. 
					
					It betrayed a foolish intention to legalize Japan's moves to go nuclear and emerge a military giant and calm down the vigilance and opposition of its neighboring countries to them.
					
					Of late Japan added a provision on "contribution to ensuring state stability" to the basic law on atomic energy and revised the basic law on space, laying down legal foundations for going nuclear and militarizing the space.
					
					It is indisputable that Japan's moves are arousing vigilance and a strong opposition of the international community.
					
					In order to seek a way out, Japan, a master hand at lies and frauds and kingpin of intrigues, invented a story about "highly-enriched uranium" and spread it to the international community. Not content with this, the Japanese authorities set in motion even reptile papers to make the international community convince of  the above-said story and went the lengths of daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. This is an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries hatched such despicable plot as faking up the fiction about "manufacture of nuclear weapons by use of highly-enriched uranium," not content with slandering the DPRK and telling lies about it.  This goes to clearly prove that their hostile policy toward the DPRK has reached an extreme phase.
					
					What should not be overlooked is the fact that the story was invented at a time when the attempt of the Japanese authorities to hastily conclude a military agreement with the south Korean puppet group in camera hit a snag due to the strong protest of the political and public circles of south Korea.
					
					It is by no means accidental that a researcher of the Institute for International Studies of Moscow University for International Relations commented that Japan tried to show south Korean lawmakers that only when south Korea cooperates with Japan, can it frustrate the nuclear program of the DPRK.
					
					Japan worked hard to sign a Japan-south Korea military agreement by orchestrating even a preposterous burlesque. This is a base act which can be conducted only by crafty and cunning barbarians of the archipelago.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries are keen to create an international pressure upon the DPRK and do harm to it through heinous burlesque. This is nothing but a pipedream.
					
					The Korean people will never remain a passive onlooker to the moves of Japan to go nuclear and turn itself into a military power.  They will never allow any wrong act to conclude the disgraceful military agreement with the Lee group of pro-Japanese traitors.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak for Seeking Conclusion of Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak for Seeking Military Agreement with Japan
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Lee Myung Bak regime originally intended to handle the issue of concluding a military agreement with Japan in a flash behind closed doors. This treachery was brought to light, sparking off big pubic furor in south Korea.
					This has touched off prompt rebuff from political and social circles as well as media which called the push given for the conclusion a behind-the-door deal and a mockery of the people.
					
					Growing stronger are voices condemning the move as it is a military bargaining with Japan, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation.
					
					The ruling party, Chongwadae (presidential office) and the "government" are now locked in fierce exchange of rhetoric to shuffle the blame off upon others. There broke out free-for-all among relevant departments, offices and persons even inside the prime minister's office, Defence Ministry and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade.
					
					The public attention is now focused on the prime mover.
					
					It is against this backdrop that the south Korean newspaper Hangyore on July 2 hit home in an editorial titled "Public furor rises over information agreement, the President should apologize and own responsibility".
					
					The paper said that the prime movers of the incident are Chongwadae and Lee Myung Bak, quoting a relevant official of the "government" as saying "behind-the-door handling of the issue was the intention of Chongwadae."
					
					The paper commented with irony that Lee became as dumb as an oyster even though he often minded other's business, talking about "forces following the north" in the past.
					
					The Kyunghyang Daily News carried on the same day an editorial titled "Who is responsible for absurd racket of concluding military information agreement?"
					
					Disclosing the essence of the developments, the paper said bigger problem than the agreement itself is the Lee Myung Bak "government's" way of thinking of mulling assigning the defence of the peninsula to outsiders to serve the U.S. and Japan's strategic interests.
					
					The U.S., Japan and south Korea cite "threats from the north" as pretexts whenever an opportunity presents itself but the military cooperation among the three parties constitutes, in essence, the infrastructure of the U.S. world strategy.
					
					The foreign ministers and defence ministers of south Korea and the U.S. agreed on building a missile defence system in 2+2 talks in June and the idea of the Japan Maritime "Self-Defence Force's" Aegis deployment was examined.
					
					The prime mover who was mulling the quick passage of the agreement should own due responsibility.
					
					As was disclosed by the south Korean media, the arch criminal of the incident is traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					What matters here is what encouraged the traitor to opt to sign the military agreement which even the successive rulers of south Korea hesitated to do.
					
					Commenting on this, a National Assemblyman from the Unified Progressive Party in article titled "Scrap military agreement meant to become stooge of "Self-Defence Forces" wrote that the push given for the agreement hints at the Lee regime's intention to work as a stooge for Japan's arms buildup and military moves.
					
					The Lee regime's earnest moves to tighten relations with the U.S. and Japan despite people's harsh criticism are attributable to its mistaken idea concerning the south-north relations and diplomacy.
					
					The regime does not hesitate to bedevil the south-north relations as it thinks that the theory of "unification by absorption" through the "collapse of the north" is possible.
					
					The south Korean people's criticism is quite natural.
					
					The Lee group is made up of matchless traitors steeped in sycophancy to the U.S. and Japan so much as to put the five traitors of 1905 into the shade.
					
					The issue of concluding the military agreement with Japan was taken up for discussion due to Lee's sycophancy to the U.S. and Japan.
					
					In the event of signing the agreement, the advance of Japan's "SDF" to the Korean Peninsula will become legal and the "SDF" can become a main force of aggression in and around the Korean Peninsula together with the U.S. forces in case of contingency.
					
					It is the very reason that the south Korean public is branding the developments as "a reckless act of fixing wings to Japan's ambitions for reinvasion".
					
					It is none other than the U.S. which egged the traitor on to conclude the agreement with Japan.
					
					The U.S. is the very one who was behind the case.
					
					The military agreement between south Korea and Japan is, in fact, aimed to round off the U.S.-led triangular military alliance among the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					The formation of the triangular military alliance would mean the establishment of NATO of Asian version serving the U.S. Asia strategy.
					
					This is a dangerous military adventure of bringing about fresh Cold War, the dark clouds of a new world war in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. intends to promptly knock into shape the war alliance and realize its strategy to dominate Asia at an early date.
					
					When the signing of the military agreement was postponed, a spokesman for the State Department said on July 2 that the U.S. is looking forward to the establishment of possibly stable relations between two strong allies of the U.S. in Northeast Asia. This was little short of pressurizing them into the earlier signing of the agreement.
					
					The situation proves that the recent developments were a product of political prostitute Lee's act of serving his American and Japanese masters.
					
					Traitor Lee would even lick their boots if they wish. He is a top class traitor who would readily turn the Korean Peninsula into the theatre for power scramble.
					
					Just imagine south Korea is put on the gambling table of big powers as a sacrifice for the U.S. Asia strategy.
					
					The Korean nation still remembers the distressed history a century ago when it was trampled underfoot by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					That's why the Korean nation already meted out a political death sentence to the traitor with towering grudge at his regime as it is set to make the disgraceful history repeat itself.
					
					The Koreans in the north and the south and abroad will never pardon the Lee group of cursed traitors.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Brands Lee Myung Bak Group as Barbarians
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Brands Lee Myung Bak Group as Barbarians
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of South Korea brought to light its true colors as the worst anti-reunification hooligans in the eyes of the world. 
					Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), went back to south Korea across the demarcation line in Panmunjom on Thursday, after visiting Pyongyang. No sooner had he crossed the demarcation line than south Korean agents pounced upon him like brutes and resorted to violence before taking him away in handcuffs. They snatched a bouquet and a Korean Peninsula flag and strangled his neck and tightly gripped his limbs like an animal before walking him away.
					
					This barbarism stunned everybody. At the sight of this unspeakable brutality not only Koreans but also the world people shake with rage. 
					
					Because they know very well how warmly compatriots in the north saw off Ro Su Hui, a pro-reunification patriot. He crossed the demarcation line via Panmunjom wrapped in a hearty farewell from compatriots. But what awaited in the south was fascist rowdyism of immoral hooligans. Merciless agents of the Ministry of Unification and the Intelligence Service of south Korea bound Ro with a rope and handcuffed him before dragging him away like an animal. 
					
					This monstrous atrocity was a premeditated and deliberate provocation, another indication of the Lee group's intention to stand in confrontation with the north to the last, rejecting national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					Ro's Pyongyang visit was a token of due courtesy prompted by the desire to share sorrow over the great loss to the nation and an entirely righteous action in view of the traditional beautiful manners and customs of the Korean nation and the spirit of national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					It was the greatest loss to the Korean nation and bitterest sorrow that leader Kim Jong Il, father of the nation who provided the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration by realizing inter-Korean summit, the first of its kind in the history of the country's division.
					
					When the South Headquarters of Pomminryon presented an application for Pyongyang visit for expressing condolences on the demise of Kim Jong Il to the Ministry of Unification of south Korea, it turned it down. This action compelled him to come to Pyongyang via a third country. 
					
					It is none other than the Lee Myung Bak group that deserves punishment because it leveled guns at the fellow countrymen mourning over the big loss to the nation and barred south Koreans from visiting Pyongyang to express condolences. 
					
					The world knows no such worst confrontation maniacs as the Lee group which barred south Koreans from visiting the north because of their differing ideas, political views and isms and disallowed them to go back home via Panmunjom. 
					
					Everyday witnesses treachery punishes patriotism and injustice wields sword at justice in south Korea owing to the Lee group's fascist rampage. 
					
					The puppet forces sentenced Rev. Han Sang Ryol to penalties after putting him to all sorts of political persecution and physical pain behind bars for nearly one year for his Pyongyang visit.
					
					They drove Rev. Kang Hui Nam, honorary chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, to a suicide. 
					
					They are doing the same evils against Ro at present. What pro-reunification patriots have done, dedicating themselves to the cause of national reunification, can never be incriminated but deserves praise from all Koreans. 
					
					The Lee group is the heinous and sworn enemy of the nation, with which the nation cannot live under the same sky. 
					
					The group will be forced to pay a thousand-fold price for its monstrous crimes.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Decries S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Hysteria
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Decries S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Hysteria
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea at the deathbed of his political life has again developed a fit of anti-DPRK epilepsy.
					On July 5 the group of traitors took away like a package Ro So Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, as he went back to south Korea after expressing condolences over the great loss to the nation.
					
					It even let the "Association of the Elders", a reactionary group made up of old men, and human scum hold a "protest rally".
					
					Serious is that it let a handful of human scum to gather near the "Unification Cathedral" in Phaju City, Kyonggi Province and commit a hideous action of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK again.
					
					The ultra-right conservative media, as if they had waited for the opportunity to happen, kicked up anti-DPRK smear campaign, trying to give impression that it reflected the public mindset.
					
					This proves that the recent racket is not just aimed to "investigate" the violation of law by Ro Su Hui.
					
					It is aimed to deliberately make a provocation against the DPRK and make the wind of confrontation with the DPRK sweep south Korea again with the provocation as an occasion.
					
					As had already been stated, the DPRK sees the insult to the dignity of its supreme leadership as the hideous provocation and the biggest crime among all the confrontation acts.
					
					Through the recent racket the Lee group again disclosed its true colors as a group of die-hard confrontation maniacs and immoral men.
					
					The group of rat-like men fond of dark ditches of the River Han has become hysterical to prevent the rays of the sun from reaching the bright human world. How ridiculous it is.
					
					The disgusting actions of the traitors in their desperate bid only harden the will of the enraged army and people of the DPRK to win a sure victory.
					
					The DPRK army and people, rallied in single mind, are advancing toward the final victory under the leadership of the brilliant Songun commander, inspired by the flag of the great sun.
					
					This historic advance that has entered another 100 years of the sun's nation necessitates a nationwide sacred war to make a clean sweep of a handful of rat-like men.
					
					The group deserves divine punishment.
					
					It should clearly understand that the merciless retaliation will be taken against the provokers any moment.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blames S. Korea for Mulling Concluding Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blames S. Korea for Mulling Concluding Military Agreement with Japan
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Lee Myung Bak group of traitors came under fire by a bylined commentary of Minju Joson Friday for mulling concluding the General Security of Military Information Agreement (GSOMIA) with Japan with an approval of "National Assembly."
					Calling the plan an act of pro-Japanese treachery putting into the shade "five traitors of 1905" who sold off the country to the Japanese imperialists, the commentary goes on:
					
					Japan has opted for overseas expansion while stepping up nuclear weaponization. Lurking behind south Korea's intention to strike GSOMIA with Japan are its sordid aims to do harm to the fellow countrymen with the help of Japan.
					
					Matter is that the Lee group and Japan are pushing for the conclusion under the U.S. manipulation. The U.S. aim is to draw the south Korean puppet forces and Japan into forming the "triangular military alliance" and contain countries around the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries seek to tighten military nexus with the Lee group backed by the U.S. and lay a springboard from which to realize its ambition for reinvasion. The Lee group's wild acts of treachery are aimed to achieve collusion and nexus with the U.S. and Japan in their aggression moves and ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					The Lee group is an arch criminal straining the situation in and around the Korean Peninsula. The nation can not live in peace and its peaceful reunification would be hard to achieve if the group of aggressors are left as they are.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Lee Myung Bak Group of Talking about "Provocations"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Lee Myung Bak Group of Talking about "Provocations"
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea claims its north-targeted war exercises with the U.S. and its military nexus with Japan are aimed to "cope with provocations of the north". It went the lengths of vociferating about those "provocations" even abroad. 
					Minju Joson Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					The Lee group's propaganda is aimed at deliberately rattling the nerves of the DPRK and compelling it to take a military counter-action and igniting a war against it under this pretext. 
					
					The commentary goes on:
					
					These war exercises further escalated the tension on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					The Lee group is tightening the military nexus with Japan, not content with frequently staging saber-rattling under the pretext of "provocations from the north." The group claims south Korea is cooperating with Japan in its efforts to "cope with provocations from the north" such as its "missile launch." 
					
					The Lee group persistently insists that the north's satellite launch was a "missile launch and provocation" and is using this as a pretext for boosting military collusion with the sworn enemy, the Japanese reactionaries. It is the sinister scenario of the group to get the Japanese reactionaries busy going nuclear, brandishing their swords for reinvasion, involved in war moves against the north so as to do harm to fellow countrymen. 
					
					By straining the situation through its ridiculous trumpeting about "provocations of the north", the Lee group seeks to divert the attention of the angry people focused on it and tide over the worsening crisis. 
					
					With no rhetoric, however, can the Lee group hide the true colors as provocateurs that brought the inter-Korean relations to collapse and drove the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war. It will never escape a severe punishment by the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refutes Anti-DPRK Forces' False Propaganda
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refutes Anti-DPRK Forces' False Propaganda
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. military warmongers claim the dangerous military exercises being staged by them against the DPRK are aimed at coping with "provocations" and "threat" from it.
					Some media are echoing this claim. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					How can the DPRK's satellite launch and the fiction about the third nuclear test invented by them be provocations and threat? How can they serve as pretexts for justifying their military actions for aggression?
					
					The commentary reveals who is a real provocateur and who is exposed to threat on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. and its followers ran the whole gamut of wrongdoings including the adoption of a UNSC presidential statement under the absurd pretext that the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes was a missile launch. They are afraid that the DPRK may conduct the third nuclear test. 
					
					They are now busy with drumbeats of war, groundlessly accusing the DPRK of provocations and threat, as they are afraid of its firm stand against their criminal acts.
					
					It is the ulterior motive of the U.S. imperialists to keep the tension escalating on the Korean Peninsula in a bid to bar the DPRK from building a thriving nation and force the army and the people in the DPRK to perish and thus swallow up the whole of Korea with ease.
					
					Lurking behind their propaganda about provocations and threat is a strategic purpose to hastily conclude their hegemonic strategy to put the Mideast region under their control and go unchallenged in Northeast Asia including the peninsula.
					
					The hostile forces launched a lot of military satellites into space, monitoring activities of the DPRK and posing a missile threat to it.
					
					The DPRK is left with no option but to take necessary measures now that the U.S., Japan and south Korean authorities continue blaming the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and floating the fiction about the third nuclear test to serve their sinister purpose.
					
					They are sadly mistaken if they think the army and people of the DPRK will remain a passive onlooker to their desperate moves, the commentary warns.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Its Moves to Conclude GSOMIA with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Moves to Conclude GSOMIA with Japan
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea released a commentary on July 3 accusing the "government" authorities of its frantic moves to conclude a military agreement with Japan at any cost. 
					The present "government" is attempting to secretly conclude the General Security of Military Information Agreement (GSOMIA) with Japan only to be brought to light, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					This case made people keenly realize that pro-Japanese elements in the 21st century are swaggering among the upper crust of power. 
					
					Despicable actions are going on even after the conclusion of the agreement was put on hold. The "government" authorities are twisting the essence of the issue and playing a trick, creating an impression that there was a problem as regards the procedures for its conclusion. 
					
					This betrays their intention to conclude it at any cost when the public uproar gets calm. 
					
					The commentary accused Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" of calling for re-discussing the agreement at the meeting of the presidium of the "National Assembly", talking about procedures and course. 
					
					Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" should clarify their stands as they often claim they are different from the shameless and hypocritical regime accustomed to telling lies to tide over its crisis. 
					
					All Koreans except a tiny handful of pro-Japanese elements do not regard Japan as an ally. It is nonsensical to conclude a military agreement with Japan keen to realize its old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Hit for Abusing Rights of Pro-Reunification Figure
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Hit for Abusing Rights of Pro-Reunification Figure
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), went back to south Korea via Panmunjom on Thursday. Ro visited Pyongyang to take part in commemorations of the 100th day since the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					No sooner had Ro crossed the demarcation line that afternoon than agents of south Korea pounced upon him like beasts and arrested him. 
					
					This unethical action of the south Korean group of traitors lashed people from all walks of life in the DPRK into towering resentment at it.
					
					Kim Jin Ho, 30, an official of the Ministry of Light Industry, said:
					
					Watching TV showing the arrest, I could not repress resentment at the group of traitors. How cruel it was. As soon as Ro crossed the demarcation line, the agents snatched the bunch of flowers presented to him by compatriots from the north and threw it away and trampled underfoot the Korean Peninsula flag. When he shouted "Long live national reunification by concerted efforts of Koreans!" they choked his neck and stooped to any infamy which made even brutes blush. We can never pardon these devils.
					
					The above-said barbarism committed by the gangsters against Ro in the eyes of fellow countrymen is an undisguised insult to the Korean nation desirous of reunification.
					
					Not only I but all other people in the north are grinding their teeth with rage.
					
					The arrest of Ro once again proved that they are traitors and barbarians without equals.
					
					Kim Yong Chol, 39, a teacher at Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, said that Ro's Pyongyang visit was an expression of due etiquette to share sorrow as a fellow countryman. He continued:
					
					It was a very righteous action in the light of the traditional beautiful manners and customs of the Korean nation and the spirit of reconciliation and unity.
					
					The group of traitors' action to disallow people from all walks of life in south Korea to express condolences over the great loss to the nation compelled Ro to cross over the deadline alone.
					
					For Ro to have expressed condolences reflecting the feelings of south Korean people can never be incriminated.
					
					The south Korean authorities should stop at once the inhuman suppression of Ro Su Hui, a pro-reunification champion. They should not block the nation's righteous march for reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Pro-Reunification People Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Pro-Reunification People Slammed
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is kicking up a wholesale crackdown after Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, went back to south Korea via Panmunjom. It made no scruple of perpetrating such hideous and shuddering acts as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement on Friday said:
					
					This was another hideous provocation against the DPRK and an unethical brutal act and a grave crime against reunification as it is blatant challenge to the aspiration and desire of all the Koreans for the unity of the nation and the country's reunification.
					
					The puppet group of traitors labeled Ro Su Hui's Pyongyang visit as "an infiltration and escape" and "encouragement and appraisal of the social system in the north" and the like. These are groundless charges and sheer sophism.
					
					Rare to be found in the world are such despicable confrontation maniacs as the Lee Myung Bak group which neither allows south Koreans to visit the north nor permits them to come back home for the mere reason that they have ideology, political view and ism different from it.
					
					The Lee group is a horde of pro-U.S. lackeys and immoral bandits who prohibit visits of south Koreans to the north where compatriots live, while allowing themselves to frequent the U.S. and please their American master, and ban acts of praising compatriots. 
					
					Such behavior of the group is nothing but the last-ditch efforts to escalate the north-south confrontation in a bid to justify its bankrupt policy of confrontation with the DPRK, step up the fascist crackdown upon pro-reunification patriotic forces of south Korea through the racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" and thus realize its daydream of staying in power.
					
					The traitors will have to experience what dear price they will pay for their crimes before they face their end.

articles.title: Corrupt "National Assembly" of South Korea
articles.content:
Corrupt "National Assembly" of South Korea
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS (Christian Broadcasting System) on July 3 reported that the election of many politicians to the 19th "National Assembly" is likely to be nullified.
					123 lawmakers or almost half of the members of the NA were booked by prosecution for election frauds as of July 2. 
					
					Eight of them were already referred to trials and 82 of them are under constant investigation.
					
					A large number of lawmakers are expected to lose their membership.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities Hit for Hurting Dignity of DPRK: UK, Peruvian Organizations
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities Hit for Hurting Dignity of DPRK: UK, Peruvian Organizations
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 27 issued a joint statement denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean "government" authorities for hurting the dignity of the DPRK.
					The U.S. imperialists together with the south Korean puppet group staged the largest-ever joint live firing drill on June 22 and committed such reckless act as firing at the DPRK flag, the statement said.
					
					Firing at the flag of an independent state amounts to a war action and a provocation violating international norms, it noted.
					
					"Peace" and "dialogue" touted by the U.S. imperialists are nothing but a gimmick to stifle the socialist system of the DPRK, it stated.
					
					Firing at the DPRK's flag showed the whole world that the U.S. imperialists are going to ignite the second Korean War to invade the DPRK, it noted, and continued:
					
					The U.S. imperialists are working hard to ignite a new war to bring down socialism of Juche and occupy the whole of Korea.
					
					We demand the U.S. discontinue all its war exercises and apologize for such grave crime as hurting the dignity of the DPRK, it stressed.
					
					The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship in an article posted on its Internet website on June 29 condemned the U.S. imperialist aggression forces present in south Korea and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for staging the largest-ever joint live firing drill, targeting against the DPRK's flag.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Switzerland
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Switzerland
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was held in Switzerland on June 30.
					Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, and a reporter and speakers said Kim Jong Un in his treatise published on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung once again clarified the sacred revolutionary life and undying feats of the President, the most distinguished leader representing the 20th century and peerlessly great man.
					
					They praised the President as the great leader of revolution, the people's benevolent father, invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated two imperialisms and outstanding elder statesman who greatly contributed to the human cause of independence.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il, who firmly defended and glorified the idea and cause of the President, accomplished the cause of immortalizing the leader for the first time in history, they noted.
					
					The Korean people reviewed with pride the glorious Juche 100 year history shining with the august names and revolutionary feats of the President and Kim Jong Il and are now dynamically advancing toward a new victory and the era of prosperity, they said.
					
					Kim Jong Un has recently published famous works through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities, they said, adding the Korean people are sure to win as they are led by him possessed of extraordinary intelligence, distinguished political caliber and personality as a great man.

articles.title: Nigerian National Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung Formed
articles.content:
Nigerian National Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung Formed
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 15.
					Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association who is a member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					The committee discussed organizing a remembrance meeting and other diverse events.

articles.title: Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung and  Kim Jong Il for National Reunification Lauded by Myanmar Personage
articles.content:
Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung and  Kim Jong Il for National Reunification Lauded by Myanmar Personage
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute issued a statement on June 20 to mark the 40th anniversary of the July 4 Joint Statement.
					The director said that on this occasion he recollected the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed for the reunification of the country. He went on:
					
					The President made sure that the joint statement was adopted on July 4, 1972 and put forward the Three Principles of National Reunification, the 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and other proposals for reunification.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il formulated the proposals advanced by the President as the Three Charters for National Reunification and worked heart and soul to implement them. It was thanks to Kim Jong Il's noble patriotism and broad magnanimity that Kim Dae Jung and Roh Moo Hyun, presidents of south Korea, visited Pyongyang in 2000 and 2007 and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the landmarks for national reunification, were adopted.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader, is wisely leading the Korean people in the struggle to reunify the country, true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					Under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the Korean people will certainly achieve the cause of national reunification by meeting all challenges of the Lee Myung Bak puppet group of traitors keen to arrest the struggle of fellow countrymen for national reunification while seeking a permanent division of the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Website of British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Website of British Organization
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its Internet website on June 29 the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Korean People's Struggle to Apply the Juche Idea."
					The work, published on June 30, July 1 and 5, 1983, explains how the Juche idea was founded and formulated theoretically and the situation which prevailed at home and abroad at that time. It also clarifies the issue of Korea's reunification, the essence of the process for making the whole world independent and other important matters arising in realizing them.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung Remembered
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung Remembered
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Papers of Myanmar and Nepal carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					A Myanmar paper on June 27 carried an article titled "Political idea of President Kim Il Sung" illustrated with a portrait of smiling President and a photo of his revolutionary activities.
					
					The life of the President, the father of socialist Korea, was totally dedicated to the people, the paper said, and went on:
					
					He considered it as a transparent political idea to believe in people as in Heaven. He put forward the Korean people as the masters of the state and society. He deemed people's happiness his own happiness.
					
					He covered more than 578 000 km equivalent to turning round the earth 14 and a half times to make journeys to mix with people till the last moments of his life from the days he set about building a new country after its liberation. 
					
					The Nepali paper Arpan on June 29 carried an article illustrated with his portrait. The article praised the undying feats he performed for the human cause of independence.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia campana de represion a Ro Su Hui
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia campana de represion a Ro Su Hui
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- Ahora, con motivo del regreso al Sur de Corea del vicepresidente de la Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP), Ro Su Hui, cruzando la linea divisoria de Phanmunjom, las autoridades surcoreanas libran freneticamente una campana de represion a el y se atreven a difamar sin vacilacion alguna la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 6 una declaracion calificandolo de otra grave provocacion, accion bestial antietica, archi-crimen yanti-reunificacion que desafia frontalmente a la aspiracion y anhelo de todos los coreanos a la unidad nacional y la reunificacion.
					
					La banda de traidores surcoreanos acusa la visita de Ro a Pyongyang de "crimen de infiltracion y fuga" y de "delito de estimulo y alabanza al regimen del Norte (de Corea)", lo que es una insistencia absurda y sofisma que no convence a nadie, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					En este mundo, no hay los fanaticos tan cinicos y viles como la banda de Lee que por ser diferentes la  idea, criterio politico y la insistencia en el principio  no permite visitar al Norte.
					
					Dicha horda corrompida y proyanqui no permite visitar a la tierra de la RPDC donde viven los connacionales, pero, si a EE.UU., ni permite alabar a sus connacionales, pero si a su amo gringo.
					
					Tales maniobras de la banda de Lee devienen la ultima desesperacion de quienes intentan realizar su ambicion de retomar el poder al justificar su frustrada politica de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC exacerbando mas la confrontacion con el Norte y al intensificar la represalia fascista sobre las fuerzas patrioticas aspirantes a la reunificacion de Corea mediante la campana de "purga de las fuerzas pro-Norte".
					
					La banda de traidores titeres experimentara cuan tragico es el precio de sus crimenes.

articles.title: Cuadros coreanos visitan nuevas viviendas de la avenida Changjon
articles.content:
Cuadros coreanos visitan nuevas viviendas de la avenida Changjon
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae y Ri Yong Ho, miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito visitaron la vispera las familias que se mudaron a las nuevas viviendas de la capitalina avenida Changjon.
					La familia de Hong Sun Hui, que tiene entre sus familiares los que sirven en el Ejercito Popular de Corea del barrio no.6 de Taedongmun, visitadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, la de Kim Kwang Chol, obrero del Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong The, del barrio no.2 de Jongro, la de Ri Jun Yong, profesor de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, del barrio no.3 de Jongro, la de Ri Hak Chol, obrero de la empresa de reforestacion del municipio de Jung, del barrio no.9 de Kyongsang y otras familias dieron bienvenida a los cuadros visitantes.
					
					Esos ultimos felicitaron a su vez a los inquilinos de nuevas viviendas.
					
					Se reunieron con los inquilinos y averiguaron en detalles la situacion de vida economica y familiar de ellos. Escuchando la impresion de mudanza les dijeron cuan caluroso y grandioso es el amor al pueblo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente quienes dispensaron la felicidad de hoy.
					
					Todos los inquilinos expresaron unanimemente el agradecimiento al Maximo Dirigente quien dispensa mismo amor y benevolencia por el pueblo del Dirigente.
					
					Los cuadros expresaron la esperanza de que todos, guardando para siempre el amor del partido, dediquen su patriotismo para la prosperidad de la patria confiando y siguiendo unicamente al Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Los visitantes tiraron fotos junto a los duenos y les entregaron las utilidades hogarenas como recuerdo de visita.

articles.title: ACNC comenta el rumor de "fabricacion de arma nuclear"
articles.content:
ACNC comenta el rumor de "fabricacion de arma nuclear"
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- Tokio Shimbun y Mainichi Shimbun difundieron el dia 2 una desinformacion como si hubieran "obtenido" un "documento" sobre el plan de desarrollo de arma nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y "existieran la indicacion de fabricar la bomba atomica con el uranio altamente enriquecido y un legado politico al respecto".
					Es un invento absurdo y complot politico para crear nuevamente el clima de presion internacional contra la RPDC.
					
					Ademas, parte de la intencion de Japon de justificar sus maniobras de armamento nuclear y conversion en potencia militar y eludir la vigilancia y reaccion de los paises vecinos.
					
					Recientemente, el pais isleno inscribio en la ley principal de energia atomica el nuevo articulo de "contribuir a la estabilidad del Estado" y enmendo la ley principal de espacio, en aras de preparar la base legal para el armamento nuclear y militarizacion cosmica.
					
					Para convencer a la sociedad internacional su rumor de la "fabricacion de la bomba atomica con el uranio altamente enriquecido" por parte de la RPDC, las autoridades japonesas instigaron a los periodicos venales a reportar que eso es "legado politico".
					
					Asi cometieron otra imperdonable provocacion politica de manchar la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					El presente incidente comprueba que llega al climax la politica hostil a la RPDC de los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que el presente complot coincide con la suspension de la firma del convenio militar Japon-Sur de Corea debido a las fuertes protestas del circulo politico y el social del Sur de Corea.
					
					No es casual que un investigador del Instituto de Estudios Internacionales de la Universidad Estatal de Relaciones Internacionales de Moscu haya comentado a los asambleistas surcoreanos que a traves del polemico acuerdo, el Sur de Corea quiso mostrar que puede frustrar el programa nuclear de la RPDC solo cuando coopere con Japon.
					
					Son irrealizables las pretensiones de los reaccionarios japoneses de destruir a la RPDC suscitando la presion internacional sobre ella.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana no tolerara nunca el armamento nuclear y la conversion en potencia militar de Japon ni su accion erronea tendente a firmar el vergonzoso convenio militar con la camarilla de Lee, vendepatria projapones.
					
					La RPDC centuplicara su capacidad de autodefensa, digan lo que digan los otros.

articles.title: ACNC comenta accion vendepatria de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ACNC comenta accion vendepatria de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- Se produjo un revuelo en el circulo politico y toda la sociedad surcoreana al conocerse el acto traidor de la banda de Lee Myung Bak encaminado a firmar en secreto y a modo de relampago un acuerdo militar con Japon. 
					Los habitantes surcoreanos del circulo politico, el social y de prensa condenan cada vez mas fuerte ese regateo con Japon, enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana.
					
					El partido en poder, la Casa Azul (Chongwadae) y el "gobierno" estan en enfrentamiento verbal para imputar la responsabilidad.
					
					La pelea se arma tambien en el seno del gobierno titere surcoreano, especificamente, entre la oficina del premier, los Ministerios de Defensa Nacional y de Relaciones Exteriores y Comercio y sus funcionarios.
					
					La atencion de la opinion publica se enfoca en quien es autor principal del caso.
					
					En estas circunstancias, el dia 2, el periodico surcoreano Hangyore llego al grano del tema en su editorial titulado "Repercusiones del convenio de informaciones. El presidente debe pedir disculpas y responsabilizarse del caso".
					
					Citando el testimonio de un funcionario del "gobierno" de que "fue intencion de Chongwadae firmar el convenio militar con Japon a puertas cerradas", el rotativo revelo que "Chongwadae y Lee Myung Bak son piezas claves del caso".
					
					Se burlo de Lee Myung Bak diciendo que este se mantiene callado cuando si hace falta hablar, en contra de su habito de pronunciar palabras vanas como "fuerzas seguidoras al Norte".
					
					Otro rotativo surcoreano Kyunghyang Daily divulgo el mismo dia un editorial intitulado "Escandalo del absurdo convenio de informaciones militares. ?Quien es el responsable?".
					
					El problema mas grave no es el convenio sino el modo de pensar del "gobierno" de Lee Myung Bak de confiar a las fuerzas extranjeras la defensa de la Peninsula Coreana dejandose llevar por los intereses estrategicos de EE.UU. y Japon, opino el editorial.
					
					Cada vez que necesitan, Estados Unidos, Japon y el Sur de Corea presentan como pretexto la "amenaza del Norte de Corea", pero, la cooperacion militar tripartita constituye la infraestructura de la estrategia norteamericana sobre el mundo, revelo.
					
					El mes pasado, los ministros de RR.EE. y de defensa nacional del Sur de Corea y Estados Unidos acordaron estructurar el sistema de defensa antimisiles en las conversaciones 2+2 y en el mismo contexto, se examino la ubicacion del buque Aegis de las "fuerzas maritimas de autodefensa" de Japon en el Mar Oeste. El autor, que intentaba aprobar apresuradamente el convenio, debe asumir la responsabilidad, insistio.
					
					Como revelan los medios de prensa del Sur de Corea, el traidor Lee es el autor principal del presente incidente.
					
					Entonces, ?por que Lee se atreve a firmar ese convenio militar con Japon, de lo que no tuvieron coraje ni sus antecesores?
					
					Al respecto, un parlamentario del Partido Progresista Unido publico su articulo "Que anule el convenio militar que significa ofrecerse como lacayo de las 'fuerzas de autodefensa'" que sigue:
					
					La firma del presente convenio quiere decir que el "gobierno" de Lee Myung Bak esta dispuesto a servir con fidelidad para el incremento de las fuerzas armadas y las acciones militares de Japon. 
					
					Por su ideal erroneo sobre relaciones intercoreanas y la diplomacia, el "gobierno" de Lee procede al fortalecimiento de relaciones con EE.UU. y Japon a riesgo de las denuncias de los habitantes. Ademas, no hace caso de la quiebra de relaciones intercoreanas pensando que es posible su teoria de "lograr la reunificacion de absorcion" basada en el "derrumbe del Norte de Corea".
					
					Son muy justas tales opiniones. 
					
					De veras, los compinches de Lee son traidores sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					El planteamiento de la concertacion del convenio militar Sur de Corea-Japon es producto inevitable del servilismo proyanqui y projapones de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					En caso de que se firme el convenio, se legalizara el avance de las "fuerzas de autodefensa" de Japon a la Peninsula Coreana. En el tiempo de emergencia, ellas devendran junto con las tropas norteamericanas el grueso de la agresion contra la Peninsula Coreana y el contorno.
					
					Por esta razon, los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores condenan el caso como una "locura que alienta la ambicion de Japon de lanzar la nueva agresion".
					
					Estados Unidos es el que incito al traidor Lee a concertar el convenio militar con Japon.
					
					Esto persigue la meta de perfeccionar la alianza militar tripartita entre Estados Unidos, Japon y el Sur de Corea bajo el protagonismo del imperio.
					
					La perfeccion de la mencionada alianza sera el nacimiento de la "OTAN" de version asiatica segun la estrategia del imperio sobre Asia.
					
					Esa aventura militar acarrea la era de nueva guerra fria y la nueva guerra mundial a la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Cuando se aplazo la suscripcion del convenio militar, un vocero del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. forzo la firma temprana declarando el dia 2 que "espera que se establezcan las relaciones solidas en todo lo posible entre los paises aliados mas fuertes de EE.UU. en el Nordeste Asiatico".
					
					Todos los hechos muestran que el presente caso es producto de la confabulacion entre prostituto politico Lee Myung Bak y sus amos norteamericano y japones.
					
					Lee es vendepatria no. 1 capaz de convertir sin vacilacion alguna la Peninsula Coreana en el campo de pugna de las potencias.
					
					Imaginense todo el territorio surcoreano convertido en chivo expiatorio de la estrategia norteamericana sobre Asia y en la mesa de juego de las potencias.
					
					?Como la nacion coreana puede olvidar su pasado martirizado en que estuvo colonizada por el imperialismo japones?
					
					La nacion coreana ya sentencio a ese traidor a la pena capital politica por su crimen de tratar de reproducir esa historia de afrentas y humillacion.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar no perdonaran jamas a la banda de Lee.
